infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: MVP Assistant needs access to your contacts to help manage relationships and communications.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: MVP Assistant needs access to your calendar to help schedule and manage your time.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: MVP Assistant uses your location to provide context-aware assistance.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: MVP Assistant uses your location to provide context-aware assistance.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: MVP Assistant needs camera access to help with visual tasks and document scanning.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: MVP Assistant needs photo library access to help organize and manage your media.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: MVP Assistant needs microphone access for voice commands and dictation.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: MVP Assistant uses motion sensors to understand your activity and provide better assistance.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: MVP Assistant can access health data to provide personalized wellness insights.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: MVP Assistant can update health data to track your wellness goals.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: MVP Assistant needs access to reminders to help manage your tasks.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: MVP Assistant uses Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: MVP Assistant uses Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices.

plugins.contactsPermission: Allow MVP Assistant to access your contacts.

plugins.calendarPermission: Allow MVP Assistant to access your calendar.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow MVP Assistant to use your location.
